hiveArticle.title: Steem Saturday, Johannesburg, 9 September 2017 Agenda (Part 1)
hiveArticle.body:
## During the past few weeks we have been in discussions with many but in the end we are pleased to announce the agenda for the event.
#
If you have not reserved your seat for the 9th of September please hurry - tickets are flying from here:

# [CLICK HERE TO REGISTER](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/steem-saturday-johannesburg-south-africa-9-september-2017-tickets-36408304218?aff=Steemit)
#
### Agenda Part 1

Can we please ask for all attendees to arrive around ***07:30 for 08:00*** as we will be starting at 08:00 and hope that everybody will enjoy a coffee and muffin with the early discussions.
#

|Time|Topic|Speaker|
|-----|------|------|
|8:00:00 - 08:45|Opening Keynote|Mitchell Loureiro VP Steemit Marketing
|08:45 - 09:30|Steemit Talk  |@Gavvet|
|08:45 - 09:30|Coffee Break||
|09:45 - 10:30|Bitcoin Talk|Lorien Gamaroff


## Some memories from last year:

Opening keynote with @ned at Steem Saturday 2016:

![IMG_1867.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmaSPMfLx1mXsB3je3znxTaiK9Z59Kor9uEB6vTKQhXyBV/IMG_1867.JPG)

### The view from the speakers perspective :)

![IMG_1902.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUa1eiAXonobpe4qZATSn5W2p4xPZmSc9bBd3vKGJPReS/IMG_1902.JPG)The audience 


@mokluc did one of his introduce yourself posts just as Steem Saturday was held in October 2016.  I wonder how many of us can boast with an introduce yourself picture with Ned :)  @mokluc will be in the audience again this year.

![IMG_1935.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmWb3CQuaXMVGT8Pn82o4o86w8HHRVnQJMJG3mNc5pvMEX/IMG_1935.JPG)

### Break Time

![IMG_1882.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZbGpomxS9FFv3Y1LUWPLNZVHi6GdRP9ayTNS48q38apC/IMG_1882.JPG)

### Food and party time
![IMG_1945.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmfUf9eNR8eyT9pMnFktJQEGtustrhbKnHA8MXtsyTimAJ/IMG_1945.JPG)

### All and all the event was a great success and we hope to improve on the experience in 2017.  Hope to see you there :)
![IMG_1923.JPG](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTCrz9qSaiYtw8vdHa4Rhr18wn4aK7gwS24SVhbWfaGXz/IMG_1923.JPG)


## Proudly Sponsored by:
![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmfPzNqLcXwMSFMdzcsAxSiUDQ7rvmSBHyJDfT4YGWK7Qw/image.png)
# Please share this post far and wide and follow us @sportspodium for more information.  
____
